p: The essential oil and water extract both showed statistically significant ( p < 0.001) suppression on BGL at all dose levels starting from 30 min of administration of glucose as compared to the negative control group administered with the vehicle (2% tween 80, 10 ml/kg). Except for the normal control, the remaining groups of mice exhibited a peak BGL 30 min after glucose load, which was followed by a decrease over time to the pre-prandial level ( Figure 3).
